title: Drawing, "Hill and Mountain Ranges, San Bernal Peak", 1889
inscribed: Written on top: "Cerro Bernal / from San Juan del Ril"
description: Distant view of a hill range and a mountain range with the peak of the San Bernal in the right center. Reverse, in opposite direction: a rock on a hilltop is shown in the left foreground against a mountain range.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hill and Mountain Ranges, San Bernal Peak", 1889.
1889. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1232-b.
